Raw Review Text: the bed frame arrived with one of the leg pieces missing the screw portion , just a wooden leg . i immediately contacted customer support to see about getting a replacement part . a note for anyone contacting customer support : do not call , use the online / email systems . if you call customer support will just wind up having you email . no biggy , but worth noting . after that was taken care of and customer support said a replacement part would be shipped out ( not as easy an ordeal as i am making it , but i will get to that ) , i went on to assembling the bed frame . the drunk lady is correct . the bed frame goes together easily and with little effort . seems pretty sturdy - a frame leg missing and all . now back to customer service . in order to request a replacement part i had to send a copy of my amazon invoice ( makes sense ) as well as the instruction manual for the bed frame ( huh ? ) and indicate the part that is missing / damaged . that took a few days of email back and forth to get taken care of . fast forward a month later and i still am missing a frame leg . i have a tracking number for fedex which has never been scanned and a bed which i am afraid will warp slightly with missing leg and void any warranty i might have ( not that i would expect warranty replacements ) . end result , solid and easy to assemble bed frame ( drunk or sober ) . poor quality assurance . poor customer support .

Raw Review Text: after my first night ' s sleeping on it , i knew i had purchased the right mattress . i had been researching several different foam mattresses including neptune , casper , and many others . i eventually chose the " signature sleep mattress " based on amazon ' s review and the price ; which included the " prime day " deal . when the mattress was delivered , i followed the unpacking instructions exactly , even letting the mattress sit out on its own for an additional 24 - hours over what the instructions recommended prior to sleeping on it . there was a very slight smell to the mattress , however , it quickly dissipated , within 2 to 3 days . every night i fall to sleep and stay asleep , waking up feeling refreshed and rested . this mattress has truly helped with back pain as well . sleeping at least 3 to 4 inches away from the edge of the mattress works best for me . i definitely recommend this mattress to anyone who wants to purchase a foam mattress .

Raw Review Text: - when unwrapping the mattress , be really careful and do not use scissors which might damage ; actually there is a small knife made for cutting the plastic wrap easily ( do read the quick user manual because it is really well written ) - this is a king - size mattress , really large . the size is just enough to fit in my new king - size bed . - it is ~ 10 inch thick , so i do not need any box and the mattress top is already like ~ 25inch high . - it really take a while to fully relax the mattress after unwrapping . i let it go for ~ 24 hours , and it looked fully restored , though the user guide says 72 hours . . - in terms of firmness , i think it is hard to say in general whether it is too hard / soft for everyone . when first sitting on it , i was a bit worried , because the mattress felt so soft and recessed quite a bit by my weight ( ~ 140lbs ) . but when i lied down flat , it was completely different ; it was not like burying yourself into a mattress , but my back felt an almost flat surface with just a bit recess . just checking the firmness chart , this mattress is medium firm and good for people of 130 - 230lbs . - the interesting part is about the memory foam . if lying on side , you can feel that the mattress is deforming to fit your body . and of course , it restores if you lie flat again . looks like this is how the memory effect takes place . the spec says there is ~ 2inch memory foam in the mattress , which i believe is more than enough for people of my weight . - i would say this mattress is better than the previous one i got from ikea , because i was able to sleep without trouble for the first night , while it took almost a whole week for me to eventually get used to the ikea mattress . - one minor complaint was the odor . the user guide says it is normal as expected , and just let it go by time . it becomes more obvious when lying on it , and can slightly make the room smelly . the odor has been lasting for quite some time , still a bit residue after > 5 days , even though it is not a terrible smell .

it was not like burying yourself into a mattress , but my back felt an almost flat surface with just a bit recess . just checking the firmness chart , this mattress is medium firm and good for people of 130 - 230lbs . - the interesting part is about the memory foam . if lying on side , you can feel that the mattress is deforming to fit your body . and of course , it restores if you lie flat again . looks like this is how the memory effect takes place . the spec says there is ~ 2inch memory foam in the mattress , which i believe is more than enough for people of my weight . - i would say this mattress is better than the previous one i got from ikea , because i was able to sleep without trouble for the first night , while it took almost a whole week for me to eventually get used to the ikea mattress . - one minor complaint was the odor . the user guide says it is normal as expected , and just let it go by time . it becomes more obvious when lying on it , and can slightly make the room smelly . the odor has been lasting for quite some time , still a bit residue after > 5 days , even though it is not a terrible smell .

Raw Review Text: for me , this bed is super firm . there are a few inches of squishy on a firm base . . . i went from the zinus green tea foam bed to this one , hoping the size and extra layers would mean extra squishy . . . but it ' s firmer , underneath , than the green tea mattress , but with the squishy gel layer on top , i can see why they call it plush . it ' s plush on firm . i have since gotten the elements latex by dreamfoam in soft . . . it ' s soft , like the mattress does not have an end , but it ' s still springy and supportive . there ' s no sinking , just soft cradling . . . i kind of liked the squishy , though , so i bought a topper . . . it comes tomorrow . anyway . this bed was not the best i was looking for . it ' s great if you want squishy on firm . there was no smell . . . it fluffed to full size very quickly . . . it is a beautiful bed ! just not soft enough for me .

Raw Review Text: " purchased this mattress specifically for the " " moisture wicking , odor reducing " " claim , as my daughter is a sweaty sleeper and also has occasional accidents . i also purchased the lucid waterproof mattress encasement . well , the first time my daughter peed her bed , it went completely through the " " waterproof " " cover and soaked the mattress . having a special needs child , we are used to the clean up involved in a peed on mattress , and we are used to a mattress only lasting a year or two before we get her a new one . never have we had a mattress excrete the rancid smell this mattress did after being peed on once . we cleaned it and dried it with a professional floor drying fan before putting a new cover on it . after a few days the mattress developed the most putrid mildew smell and no matter how many times we cleaned it over the next couple weeks . upon throwing this mattress away , i cut it open and there was no mold or mildew , it was completely dry inside , it just stunk really really bad . lucid customer service was one of the worst i have dealt with . they sent me a replacement encasement ( the same one that failed in the first place ) , and a cleaning kit for stains ( the mattress was not stained ) . i dealt with joey over email as well as over the phone and he refused to do anything further . he would not replace the mattress or refund any of the $ 270 i spent on this mattress . he acknowledged that the waterproof encasement failed and replaced it under the warranty , but said that the warrantee does not extend to the mattress itself . and that the 10 year warrantee on the mattress only covers " " manufacturing defects . " " joey also warned me that if i were to leave a negative review that he has done more than their warrantee requires , as it says its " " at lucid sole discretion " " to fulfill the warrantee . avoid this company "

Raw Review Text: i purchased the twin size mattress about 6 months ago to replace an ikea mattress for my toddler . the previous mattress was uncomfortable and had a strange smell . i wanted to keep something that was 5 - 6 inch height range . this mattress is more comfortable than i expected . it has held up well in the last 6 months with no sign of wear or tear . i can lay on the twin mattress with my son and it is still super comfortable . we are considering switching our traditional mattress to a lucid foam mattress after this experience ! also , it ' s not hot like some foam mattresses or mattress topper are ( and we live in az ! ) . my sister loves hers as well !

Raw Review Text: we had high hopes for this product . we changed from a conventional mattress . we made it past the 100 no question return period and thought we had found the right mattress . recently , my wife and i both started having terrible backaches . we contacted zinus , took pictures of what they asked for and tried to send them . their computer system kept rejecting our replies as spam . i continually had to go back to their website , fill out their form with all sorts of required information just to get them what they asked for . we had to measure the depressions that are forming in the mattress . they measured 1 inch . in the reply that i finally received from zinus , they stated that the depressions needed to be 1 - 1 / 2 inches before a warranty would be considered . in the description of their product from this website it states : " worry free 10 year limited warranty . another comfort innovation from zinus . " well , that is obviously not true and is definitely not a comfort . we will never again buy or recommend a zinus product and encourage everyone else to steer away from their products and " warranty " !

Raw Review Text: " i got this mattress after my tall , trusted air mattress decided to give up , and crumble like a bad souffle during the night . props to amazon for getting this to my door one day in advance , i slept on the floor for 2 days with only a thin mattress topper as cushion . . the mattress came very well packed , very compressed , and was easy to set free . there was but a very faint smell that was not even unpleasant , but maybe that was more from the plastic wrap . within 6 hours , it was expanded enough that the surface did not feel inconsistent . there was no smell . or maybe the clean sheets covered it . the mattress cover is a good measure of how much it will expand ( the mattress will fill it ) , and it was already very , very close to full . id estimate it reached 90 - 95 % of its expanded size in 6 hours , and felt very consistent with no soft spots . - this might have been a product manufactured recently , eager to be used , so i would recommend following the manufacturer guide and wait the recommended time , just in case you get something that has been in a warehouse for longer . i did not because mattress vs floor is an obvious choice . after 2 days on the floor , i had a 3 hour nap and woke up feeling like gold . i pulled everything from it and gave it a chance to grow some more , now it full size . this is just the right size for regular sheets with elastics to fit under and be stretched . i weight about 230 pounds ( ~ 105kg ) , it feels really comfy with good support , back , side , belly or contortionist . i use a 2 inch basic foam mattress topper , so ca not accurately judge temperature , but it felt less stuffy then with the air mattress . no surprise there , vinyl vs foam . i liked the little touches that came with it , like the cutter and thank you card . one can throw them on anything for no additional cost , but made me feel like someone of the other end cared about delivering . thus , this was not considered on my rating . this review was just about the product itself , and my first impressions . although i threw myself on it and gone " " weeeee ! " " . i have some mild joint issues which i care nothing about ( elbows and knees ) , and there will be a period of adjustment . if these change in any way ( not expected ) , ill come back with the better or the worse . if you are reading this and looking for a comfy mattress which appears to have good quality for the price , it might be worth considering . personally , i looked through a lot of them , and picked this one . hope i am not wrong : ) "

Raw Review Text: this mattress checks all the boxes ! i researched memory foam , traditional and hybrid mattresses . after answering many questions , it determined memory foam would suit me best . i had a lucid memory foam ( medium firm ) but lately my hips and shoulders would wake me up from the aches , after a few hours . i was down to comparing casper , purple , and layla after reading many , many reviews and watching you tube comparisons , i decided to search ' plush memory foam ' on amazon and it brought up breksta . i ' ve been sleeping on it a month now and it was an incredible , full night of sleep from the 1st night ! my other mattress had no ' give ' or ' bounce ' . i love the plush , soft , top on the breksta ! exactly what i wanted . i had a dream cloud topper on my 1st mattress , but it ' s not needed on this one . hard to describe how this mattress is soft , yet a firm nights sleep . i ' ve been looking for that dreamy , pillowy feel and this one has it ! ! like other reviews , it is hard to keep sheets on it , but that is nothing when you get a restful nite of sleep ! i reccomend this mattress to all my friends ! ! and the price was a couple hundred less than the others i would researched .

Raw Review Text: 1 year review update . i went through quite a few foam latex mattress in my life time . even temper pedic ones and prior to amazon , the foam order website . a lot of them advertise as firm but they seem to be too soft . i took a chance here and did not regret it . this is cool to sleep in . the temperpedic were getting much warmer than i like . i tried the beds are casper show room and they feel the same as my marley bed . no need to spend all the extra money at someone else . so after one year . it still feels new . the bed came mid size box . just unroll it and cut the bag . it inflated rather fast . i remember some of the other ones took 2 - 3 days . i still gave the bed 24 hours to make sure it ' s fully inflated and tested it out . after a year still no issue .

Raw Review Text: there is not a lot of rebound in the material . my husband and i purchased this on prime day last year , and have been disappointed with it since . i wanted to give it time with use before posting a review , but it is rather uncomfortable . we both frequently wake up with back and neck pain . it has also sunken in permanently in the space where we sleep , which is certainly not what we were looking for in a foam top mattress . it ' s an inexpensive product , and as such does not last long . we will likely be purchasing a new mattress again very soon . save what you would spend on this and put it towards a more expensive , higher quality item .

Raw Review Text: i ordered the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress to replace our 10 years old form mattress . our 10 years old form mattress was delivered to us within a box and a box quite heavy , i had my son help me move to the room . once i opened a box , i saw a envelope with the instructions of letting it fully inflated for 3 days and the provided safety knife inside . using the provided safety knife to remove the outer plastic cover was easy , no worry of breaking or cutting the mattress fabrics . i set the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress on the floor and followed the instructions of letting it fully inflated for 3 days . i measured the thickness of the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress and got 11 . 5 inches , close enough . my wife was very excited about trying the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress after we set the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress up on our bed foundation . compared to our 10 years old form mattress , the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress let me feel cool and thanks for the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress egg crate designed foam layer that increases the airflow . the mattress firmness is just right for us , with ample support . the outer fabric cover is removable and washable which is a plus . we had been sleeping on the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress for 2 weeks and nothing i would complain about , the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress has a comfortable and cool feeling which i did not feel from our 10 years old form mattress . the novilla 12 inches queen size foam mattress is a good buy for me !

Raw Review Text: i purchased this mattress to give guests over the holidays something better to sleep on than an air mattress . we already own a zinus smartbase bed foundation ( https : / / www . amazon . com / gp / product / b01ghhiw5y / ref = ppx _ yo _ dt _ b _ search _ asin _ title ? ie = utf8 & psc = 1 ) . the reviews on this mattress were so mixed i was very hesitant , particularly in a 6 inch mattress , but decided it was worth the risk . happy i did . i took this mattress out of the packaging within 24 hours and let this mattress inflate on a zinus smartbase bed foundation . this mattress inflated to about 4 inches within 12 hours . i paid particular attention to the corners because so many people had problems there . as this mattress inflated , i adjusted the mattress cover at the corners to make sure there was room for ( that the mattress cover did not restrict ) the corners to inflate properly . within 24 - 48 hours this mattress achieved the advertised height . it was very comfortable sleeping directly on the a zinus smartbase bed foundation frame . there a lot of conjecture in the reviews about the mattress cover . i have no beef with the one i received . honestly i think this mattress is a great value for a guest bed .

Raw Review Text: your browser does not support html5 video . so far a few days in and i love the entire mattress . not too plush , but not firm hard like a spring mattress , kind of in between . i am not feeling like i am sinking or overheating in the entire mattress . i can move about anywhere on the entire mattress and be comfortable . the entire mattress has next to no scent . the entire mattress is free of animal by products ( vegan ) to my knowledge . good price for a quality mattress that eco friendly . at least so far couple days in i have no complaints and would recommend the entire mattress to anyone . the entire mattress at an entirely reasonable price point certipur seems like table stakes for all manufacturers now . this was my first time buying a mattress in a box . so much easier ! ! ! i could lift a box up to the room by myself , instead of trying to maneuver a gigantic mattress up the stairs . packaging was easy to get off . a box , then the entire mattress is rolled up and wrapped in the plastic . put the entire mattress on the bed frame and slowly cut away the plastic , and the entire mattress unrolls the entire mattress . the instructions say to leave the entire mattress for 2 - 3 hours before sleeping on the entire mattress . no off - gassing smell at all . . . in fact , no smells at all ! awesome . every sleep since getting the entire mattress has been wonderful . even waking up is easier because it actually feels like i am fully rested , as opposed to tossing and turning all night ! i am curious how the entire mattress will feel in the summer months

Raw Review Text: your browser does not support html5 video . this is about i had ordered for my college apartment . many peers that i go to school with recommended this memory foam to me because of this memory foam price and because of this memory foam quality . no matter what it is on amazon i am pretty sure everyone always goes and checks on the reviews before purchasing . i do it all the time it just something that we do so we can have reassurance that we will be getting a good product . well let me tell you this memory foam has reviews from all over the one star rating to five star rating . i have only had this memory foam for about two days now but i can say that i am very pleased . in the video attached you can see this memory foam decompressing from the moment that i took this memory foam out of the box and cut the sides like the instruction said to . many people say that the mattresses do not completely get to the thickness that many people bought the mattresses but for me this memory foam did exactly that i bought a 10 inch mattress and a 10 inch mattress is 10 inches . the box also tells you that you probably should unpack the bed within 72 hours but i did it as soon as i got an amazon notification that the bed has been delivered . distad really compares to the nectar and purple memory foam mattresses that got sold all over instagram and youtube . but instead of paying $ 800 for memory foam i only paid 200 and i am very pleased and glad that i did so . so if you see a reading of three and someone complains that it does not completely blow up just take the risk and do it right . if your bed does not blow up to the exact 10 inches no need to cry river you bought a $ 200 bed instead of an $ 800 bed .

Raw Review Text: " first i would like to say you get what you pay for . if you buy a mattress for under $ 200 you will get one that worth that . there are a lot of reviews for campers and guest bedrooms . i am sure it works for that . i got it to sleep on every night which would be fine if i was a kid or tween . as a grown adult this was no good ! in less then a year i probably lost about an inch and a half of the thickness and had to crawl out of bed due to severe back pain . i am 41 years old and 57 " " at 150 pounds , for a woman 150 pounds is in the perfect bpi . this is not an every night sleeper unless you are a child or very light ( under ) weight adult . even then if you are not a child it wo not last you long . i must say i did not have much money and it was better than the floor . "

Raw Review Text: " the 12 " is a gorgeous mattress for the price ( so far ) . after reading tons of reviews , i ordered the 12 " " just in case the 12 " did not decompress all the way as some unlucky purchasers have reported . my order arrived within 24 hours : - ) ! ! ! i immediately unboxed the 12 " , placed the 12 " on the box spring proper side up , and slooowly and caaaarefully clipped off both layers of plastic wrap . . . and then . . . as i watched the 12 " decompress . . . whooooooosh ! . . . a smile crossed my face . before unboxing the 12 " i had hoped for the best but prepared myself for something to be not quite right . boy , oh boy , was i ever pleasantly surprised at how fast the 12 " decompressed to the 12 " full 12 " " inch thickness . it actually took only about 7 hours to fully poof up with zero malformations anywhere . naturally , i could not wait the recommended 24 - 48 hours to make up the bed and test the 12 " out because i was too exited . oh my gosh - it heavenly . this morning , after the first night sleep , hubby said the bed feels like a really good hotel bed and that the bed " " very , very , very comfortable . " " since this is all new . . . i will come back and give an update after a few months have passed . right now though , all i have to say is whoooo - hoooo ! happy camper ! "

Raw Review Text: bought this for young child bed but i have accidentally fallen asleep on it many times and it is so comfortable ! ! you would not think it would be as great because of the thickness but this kicks my super thick kingsize to the curb in terms of comfort . i was really shocked . that being said if you are a heavier person you may not feel quite as much comfort but its perfect for a child or lighter adult . i wanted something that was organic and non toxic as a priority since this was going to be used by a small child . however i was very pleased and surprised it was not only that but very comfy as well . used for a trundle bed and the 6 in fits perfectly so we can slide pillow and thick comforter underneath as well . highly recommend !

Raw Review Text: " this matress is thick . our queen fitted sheet barely fits and sometimes works our queen fitted sheet free on a corner . this is not a mattress issue though , i did buy a 12 " " matress . a 12 " " matress is heavy . not a bad thing because a 12 " " matress is foam . when sleeping you will not disturb your partner because you can not feel your partner move . a 12 " " matress really does hug the body . you can probably put a glass of water on one side and lay on the other without spilling a glass of water . i feel like sleep quality is somewhat better than our old spring matress but keep reading . my wife had back surgery and back surgery does help my wife a little more than our old spring matress so another plus . 1 major complaint we have it that it said a 12 " " matress is layered with a cool gel layer to help you stay cool and comfortable while sleeping . my wife and i have both felt this is not the case . my wife and i feel that a 12 " " matress holds too much heat . sometimes my wife and i will wake up sweating because the foam is retaining so much heat . you can actually feel the heat on the bed when you get up and put your hand there . so maybe a little more of a cooling layer thickness is recommended ? ? "

Raw Review Text: " first and foremost the 12 " " version is by no means a " " medium " " firmness . the 12 " " version extremely stiff , not substantially different feeling from the thick carpet we have the 12 " " version sitting on . compared to traditional mattress stores the 12 " " version definitely falls on the firm side as well . perhaps someone heavier could actually compress the 12 " " version enough to have the 12 " " thickness make a difference , but at 140 pounds neither myself or my partner can compress the 12 " " version more than ~ 1 " " as side sleepers . certainly not enough to align your spine and sleep comfortably , as you can feel the points of pressure on your back very clearly when lying down . second , according to the instructions the package must be opened within 72 hours of delivery to fully inflate . this is not mentioned in the description but is important if you plan on ordering before actually moving . ours fully inflated to 12 " " , even on the corners . the 12 " " version appears perfectly flat as the 12 " " version should . the process took 24 hours and was slower in the corners but eventually completed . the return process for such an item is likely to be annoying given how large such an item grows once out of the box . a decent topper can probably fix such an item being too firm , but at 12 " " thick already a decent topper will also make such an item too thick for any normally sized sheets . in short , a thin version of such an item with a topper may be worth your time and money , but avoid the thicker ones , you are unlikely to end up in a situation you want to be in . 3 weeks in update : we tried making such an item work with a 3 " " topper but adding that such an item just too thick for any sheets we could find and far too rough on our backs without . definitely go thinner than 12 " " or find a more plush model . "

Raw Review Text: i went from a pillow top mattress that was caving in and after researching the different inexpensive memory foam mattresses on amazon and reading through reviews , i chose this one . i just want to emphasize that this one is reasonably firm . this is great for having a long lasting memory foam mattress , however , personally this one has not been the most comfortable for me . my boyfriend who is roughly 200 lbs loves this one ! so just to make it clear , this one is a great quality mattress , but again this one is pretty firm . for those who prefer softer mattresses , i would suggest buying a memory foam topper to pair with this one ( which could extend the duration of how long this one will last ! ) but anyways , i am going to buy a 3 inch memory foam topper and i am sure a 3 inch memory foam topper will be just right ! so definitely go ahead and invest in this one and if you do not like how firm this one is , invest in a topper . it worth the money , trust me . i am still satisfied but as a 120 lb female , this one just a bit too firm for my personal preference .

Raw Review Text: buy this product ! ! ! ! ! i am so happy with this product ! they went above and beyond what i could have ever expected . this product arrived here in a fast manner , wrapped so tight i could barely get this product out of package ! the cover was a great addition too . i layed the cover flat for the duration of day and used the cover first night last night . i can not believe how much better i slept . i usually roll around a lot and suffer from chronic pain . i fell asleep so fast and when i woke up i did not want to get out of bed ! i realized i did not move around during sleep because my other side of bed looked unused ! chronic pain was so much more subdued and made it easy to be able to fall asleep . the padding is just right and fit my bed perfectly . my sister had just spent an insane amount on one , i told my sister about mine today and how much i loved it . i am looking so forward to bed tonight ! and what an incredible price for this ! thanx guys thanx guys really brought it home !

Raw Review Text: there was a slight smell at first , but a slight smell did eventually dissipate after 4 - 5 days . a little longer than i expected . just ensure you leave it uncovered ( do not put any sheets on it during this time . ) the mattress is pretty comfortable . the only reason the mattress not 5 stars is because the smell duration and the edges of the mattress has no real support . be careful you do nt sit on the edge for long periods of time . seems like it would compromise the edges of the mattress long term . overall , the comfort and firmness was better than i expected .

Raw Review Text: i ordered this mattress for replacing my old simmon queen one . my old simmon queen one sags on the right side due to many times moving and this worsens my back pain . after investigating for a long time i decided to give this mattress a try at this $ 200 level for a twin size hybrid and after sleeping on this mattress for over two weeks , i think this mattress deserves my recommendation . the edge supports are good for arms and legs if you do not move a lot when sleeping . the qualities of the springs are good , especially because this mattress is a new mattress . i ca not say the duration after 3 or 5 years , but so far it is amazing for me . the top layer is very good compared my old simmon queen one , the top layer is not soft or hard , the top layer is just the one gives support and buffer . the handles on the side are excellent design making moving this mattress easily . this is super helpful for students like me moving around every year . but the twin size seems a little bit larger than my ikea frame . this mattress can not stay on the edge and will slide somewhat when no one lies on this mattress . but after all , this $ 200 level for a twin size hybrid is only $ 200 and you ca not say more . i think this mattress is really worthy . i will keep using this mattress every night and post something new after one year , if the duration is not good . overall , i give this mattress 9 out of 10 .

Raw Review Text: " your browser does not support html5 video . i took a gamble and tried this " " bed in a box . " " this " " bed in a box arrived in a decently large box , but despite the box size , i did not think this " " bed in a box would ever be able to puff up or flatten out enough to sleep on . ( i may have been wrong . ) this " " bed in a box was wrapped inside a decently large box with a layer of shrink wrap and yet another plastic wrap to protect this " " bed in a box . i started the uncompressing process by placing this " " bed in a box on my ultra - soft two - foam - pad topped old mattress and flipping and rolling this " " bed in a box to the correct orientation while i removed a layer of shrink wrap . i found two good - sized pillows rolled up in the package . ( we absolutely love two good - sized pillows rolled up in the package ! ) after this " " bed in a box sat all day on the foundation , this " " bed in a box was noticeably larger . i decided that this " " bed in a box might need additional time fluffing up before i sleep on this " " bed in a box . so , i flopped this " " bed in a box over on this " " bed in a box edge so i could sleep another night on my ultra - soft two - foam - pad topped old mattress . after looking at this " " bed in a box in the morning , i repositioned this " " bed in a box on my ultra - soft two - foam - pad topped old mattress and allowed this " " bed in a box to continue to " " develop . " " during the day , i researched foam mattresses and read that allowing the new mattress to fluff up for 72 hours before sleeping on the new mattress was best . so , on night two of ownership of this " " bed in a box , i flopped this " " bed in a box back onto this " " bed in a box side for the night . the next morning , i repositioned this " " bed in a box squarely on my ultra - soft two - foam - pad topped old mattress . by evening , i had decided that 60 hours was enough fluffing time and resolved to give this " " bed in a box a try . my ultra - soft two - foam - pad topped old mattress old and uncomfortable and getting older by the minute . and old . years ago , i added a three - inch topper and then , a couple of years later , i added another three - inch topper on top of a three - inch topper . looking at my bed , you d think i was the princess and the pea from the sheer height of my bed , the softness , and the ultra - cushiness . i do not quite have twenty featherbed layers but , like the princess , i can feel every little thing . ( so annoying ! ) to solve the issue , i could add another topper to the top of the toppers and some custom sized sheets and a ladder , or i could come up with another solution . hence my gamble that nectar mattresses are as good as folks say nectar mattresses are . my first night on the nectar was challenging . i am both a back and side sleeper and , in addition , my back can sometimes hurt so bad my back wakes me up . i woke many times during my first night on the nectar wondering why i chose this " " bed in a box . when i finally got up from my first night on the nectar , my back as if i d worked an entire week bent over . i was not impressed . but during the day i loosened up , so i psyched myself up for night two with the nectar . night two with the nectar was much better . the mattress was definitely much firmer than the princess and the pea mattress configuration that i had been sleeping on , but i was starting to warm up to the mattress . the third night rolled around , and i was starting to be sold on this " " bed in a box . i no longer mentally debated the issue of whether i would toss this " " bed in a box away and go back to my ultra - soft two - foam - pad topped old mattress . the next morning , i tried to quantify what was selling me on this " " bed in a box . i typically wake up and go to the bathroom in the middle of the night and when i go back to bed i find that i have become so warm from the bed that i resume my night with the covers thrown off and then gradually bring the covers back on when i cool down and finally am able to sleep . on the third night , i did not get up a single time during the night to use the bathroom , and i did not need to flip the covers away for an extended time to cool myself . i slept nicely cool and woke up with none of my typical aches and pains . i believe this " " bed in a box is going to work out great , and ill lose the princess and the pea title . my husband is very pleased because we typically wake each other up multiple times during the night when we shift around or my husband decides to have a restless leg syndrome attack . a huge side benefit has been that this " " bed in a box dampens the motion and we are not feeling the other movements . cool ! overall , we are sold . our sleep is improving dramatically in duration and quality . so glad we tried the mattress . very , very pleased . as the parent of kiddos with autism , there are causes near and dear to my heart . let amazon donate to your favorite charity ! use amazon smile ( smile . amazon . com ) when you order and amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase . check out how amazon smile works at https : / / smile . amazon . com / gp / chpf / about / ref = smi _ se _ rspo _ laas _ aas . my shopping is donating to my favorite charity , canines for independence at no cost to me . awesome ! "

( so annoying ! ) to solve the issue , i could add another topper to the top of the toppers and some custom sized sheets and a ladder , or i could come up with another solution . hence my gamble that nectar mattresses are as good as folks say nectar mattresses are . my first night on the nectar was challenging . i am both a back and side sleeper and , in addition , my back can sometimes hurt so bad my back wakes me up . i woke many times during my first night on the nectar wondering why i chose this " " bed in a box . when i finally got up from my first night on the nectar , my back as if i d worked an entire week bent over . i was not impressed . but during the day i loosened up , so i psyched myself up for night two with the nectar . night two with the nectar was much better . the mattress was definitely much firmer than the princess and the pea mattress configuration that i had been sleeping on , but i was starting to warm up to the mattress . the third night rolled around , and i was starting to be sold on this " " bed in a box . i no longer mentally debated the issue of whether i would toss this " " bed in a box away and go back to my ultra - soft two - foam - pad topped old mattress . the next morning , i tried to quantify what was selling me on this " " bed in a box . i typically wake up and go to the bathroom in the middle of the night and when i go back to bed i find that i have become so warm from the bed that i resume my night with the covers thrown off and then gradually bring the covers back on when i cool down and finally am able to sleep . on the third night , i did not get up a single time during the night to use the bathroom , and i did not need to flip the covers away for an extended time to cool myself . i slept nicely cool and woke up with none of my typical aches and pains . i believe this " " bed in a box is going to work out great , and ill lose the princess and the pea title . my husband is very pleased because we typically wake each other up multiple times during the night when we shift around or my husband decides to have a restless leg syndrome attack . a huge side benefit has been that this " " bed in a box dampens the motion and we are not feeling the other movements . cool ! overall , we are sold . our sleep is improving dramatically in duration and quality . so glad we tried the mattress . very , very pleased . as the parent of kiddos with autism , there are causes near and dear to my heart . let amazon donate to your favorite charity ! use amazon smile ( smile . amazon . com ) when you order and amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase . check out how amazon smile works at https : / / smile . amazon . com / gp / chpf / about / ref = smi _ se _ rspo _ laas _ aas . my shopping is donating to my favorite charity , canines for independence at no cost to me . awesome ! "

Raw Review Text: i bought this mattress for my husband and i after a recommendation from a friend . we are using this mattress for our beach house where we were temporarily living during the pandemic . we wanted a mattress that was super comfortable for long durations of time , but that did not break the bank , considering we only use this mattress every once in a while . wow were we impressed with this mattress . this mattress is rather firm , which we like , but feels like a memory - foam quality so we are super comfortable . i am now trying to talk my husband into getting this mattress for our bedroom at home rather than one of the fancier out of the box options . overall , if you are not extremely picky about getting a fancy mattress and like a fancy mattress firm , i think you ll love this mattress .

Raw Review Text: i used this bed frame for 4 years in 4 years i moved 4 times and i did not face any issues at all . i t was very easy to assemble < 45 minutes of work for a single person . all the tools required to assemble were provided with this bed frame . even while moving i did not have to disassemble this bed frame completely which made things easier . even after 4 years while moving i gave this bed frame to a friend and a friend is using this bed frame . i will definitely recommend .

Raw Review Text: " { update june 23 , 2020 } updating my review from 3 to 5 stars . sol customer service and shipping speed has sold me . i called with concerns about the mattresses slight firmness and scent , and joe promptly offered me a 50 % discount on a topper with topper cover and a free mattress cover replacement with the hopes of alleviating the scent . i called before 3 pm , so i recd it the next day ! so despite the things i did not like about the mattress , the mattresses and the company pros outweigh the things i did not like about the mattress exponentially . { org review may 23 , 2020 } what i like : 1 . the price . though i have no way to verify the authenticity of the certification claims , assuming the certification claims are accurate , the mattresses is , by far , one is the least expensive 100 % latex options available . 2 . the cover . incredibly soft ! 3 . the fact that the mattresses all natural and could conceivably outlast any other type of mattress out there . 4 . comfortable ! 5 . incredibly fast shipping . bought direct , not from amazon 6 . one piece support core . i think one piece support core . adds to durability , lifespan , and more uniform comfort . 7 . sleep trial . you can send it back if you do not like it . what i do not like : 1 . heavy . 2 . hard to move around by yourself 3 . the scent . not a bad scent , in fact like the scent , but eventually had to air the scent out for a bit after using for a couple of days because my wife disease augments my wife disease sense of smell and makes the scent stronger than the scent really is . 4 . dimensions . the mattresses advertised as a 9 " " mattress , but after a week , the mattresses still measuring under 8 " " . it important to note some stats about yourself when reviewing a mattress like this so people can have a better idea who a mattress like this fit for . i am a 510 " " , 207 lb , 46yo male , side and stomach sleeper with lower back pain and a recurring left shoulder stress injury . this all started when my wife disease complained my wife disease had had enough of our 10 year old sealy mattress that had pitted where we slept . there a lot of information out there , but i ultimately decided to go the latex route for it known durability , lifespan , natural biodegradable nature , and comfort claims . i initially tried puffy lux because i thought i needed very soft for side sleeping . ended up not liking memory foam , the stuff that in memory foam , the stuff that in it , memory foam , the stuff that in it feel , and memory foam , the stuff that in it was too soft and aggravated my back and shoulder because i sank in too much . then i went the opposite direction thinking i needed firm because my wife disease said i always end up in my stomach . got the purple 2 mattress . same thing - back and shoulder pain because the purple 2 mattress was too hard . researched all the brands i tried ( e . g . saatva , avocado , awara , sleep on latex ) and decided that since i tried 2 expensive brands , what have i got to lose since 2 expensive brands offer a sleep trial . to compare , i actually bought one from a company in virginia called sleep essentials . sadly a company in virginia called sleep essentials do not have a sleep trial , but i thought for sure i d like one from a company in virginia called sleep essentials better than the sleep on latex one . i ended up coming back to sol because of the softer cover and the softer cover was just a bit softer which helped alleviate my shoulder pain better . i got the medium firmness and though the softer cover could be just a bit softer for my taste , the softer cover was the closest and least expensive of all the brands i tried . i got the softer cover fast too . my only complaint now is the firmness and scent , and joe promptly offered me a 50 % discount on a topper with topper cover and a free mattress cover replacement with the hopes of alleviating the scent . i called before 3 pm , so i recd it the next day ! so despite the things i did not like about the mattress , the mattresses and the company pros outweigh the things i did not like about the mattress exponentially . { org review may 23 , 2020 } what i like : 1 . the price . though i have no way to verify the authenticity of the certification claims , assuming the certification claims are accurate , the mattresses is , by far , one is the least expensive 100 % latex options available . 2 . the cover . incredibly soft ! 3 . the fact that the mattresses all natural and could conceivably outlast any other type of mattress out there . 4 . comfortable ! 5 . incredibly fast shipping . bought direct , not from amazon 6 . one piece support core . i think one piece support core . adds to durability , lifespan , and more uniform comfort . 7 . sleep trial . you can send it back if you do not like it . what i do not like : 1 . heavy . 2 . hard to move around by yourself 3 . the scent . not a bad scent , in fact like the scent , but eventually had to air the scent out for a bit after using for a couple of days because my wife disease augments my wife disease sense of smell and makes the scent stronger than the scent really is . 4 . dimensions . the mattresses advertised as a 9 " " mattress , but after a week , the mattresses still measuring under 8 " " . it important to note some stats about yourself when reviewing a mattress like this so people can have a better idea who a mattress like this fit for . i am a 510 " " , 207 lb , 46yo male , side and stomach sleeper with lower back pain and a recurring left shoulder stress injury . this all started when my wife disease complained my wife disease had had enough of our 10 year old sealy mattress that had pitted where we slept . there a lot of information out there , but i ultimately decided to go the latex route for it known durability , lifespan , natural biodegradable nature , and comfort claims . i initially tried puffy lux because i thought i needed very soft for side sleeping . ended up not liking memory foam , the stuff that in memory foam , the stuff that in it , memory foam , the stuff that in it feel , and memory foam , the stuff that in it was too soft and aggravated my back and shoulder because i sank in too much . then i went the opposite direction thinking i needed firm because my wife disease said i always end up in my stomach . got the purple 2 mattress . same thing - back and shoulder pain because the purple 2 mattress was too hard . researched all the brands i tried ( e . g . saatva , avocado , awara , sleep on latex ) and decided that since i tried 2 expensive brands , what have i got to lose since 2 expensive brands offer a sleep trial . to compare , i actually bought one from a company in virginia called sleep essentials . sadly a company in virginia called sleep essentials do not have a sleep trial , but i thought for sure i d like one from a company in virginia called sleep essentials better than the sleep on latex one . i ended up coming back to sol because of the softer cover and the softer cover was just a bit softer which helped alleviate my shoulder pain better . i got the medium firmness and though the softer cover could be just a bit softer for my taste , the softer cover was the closest and least expensive of all the brands i tried . i got the softer cover fast too . my only complaint now is the fact that the cover is dry clean only , so i had to put a protector on the cover , and my wife disease ca not deal with the scent . "

Raw Review Text: " this one was supposed to be a big - girl mattress for my child who quit wetting the bed and graduated out of pull - ups . this one ended up being a huge disappointment , and now my child who quit wetting the bed and graduated out of pull - ups has to wait for another mattress to arrive after my child who quit wetting the bed and graduated out of pull - ups expectations were crushed . i usually love zinus products . in the past few years i have purchased six items from zinus : - 10 " " king mattress ( love 10 " " king mattress , still use 10 " " king mattress - 5 star rating from me ) - three 6 " " twin mattresses ( 2 out of three are still in use , returning the third now ) - mattress base for the king size ( love mattress base for the king size - 5 star product ) - bed skirt ( love it , still use it , another 5 star product ) the two 6 " " mattresses i purchased , which are supposed to be the same as this one , were purchased in 2017 and were amazing . if i were writing a review based on the two 6 " " mattresses i purchased , which are supposed to be the same as this one , this would be a five star review . unfortunately this time i got a dud mattress . the memory foam expanded but the base foam never did . a dud mattress was actually warped in some places too , like a dud mattress tried to expand but just gave up . i do not know if this is a zinus problem or an amazon storage problem . maybe zinus can work with amazon closer to ensure their mattresses do not stay in storage too long , even if it requires items to not be filled with the expected prime speed . i really wanted to toss a dud mattress in the trash and not return a dud mattress , but amazon requires that i send a dud mattress back for my refund . if you find yourself in my shoes , just get a larger box from somewhere because you wo not get a dud mattress back in the original box . you ll probably need assistance and a lot of duct tape , like i did . unfortunately , now i ca not trust zinus enough to replace a dud mattress with the same one , so i purchased a different brand . thank you zinus for all the other great products i received from you , and i hope you can fix any issues that make some of these mattresses not expand properly . i d love to be your customer again . "

Raw Review Text: for the record , everyone should know ahead what type of firmness is best for you before hand , i had a scanner test at sleepys a while back to find out . that way you ll get the perfect mattress that is just right for you . finding a bed and making sure the mattress is the one for you is the hardest part or the simplest one . i ordered the plush because a bedroom store recommended the plush for me . the delivery was quick since the delivery only took a business day before the actual date which makes me very happy for the speed not interfering with my work schedule . now when it came to the unpacking anyone who is strong enough can do the unpacking on anyone who is strong enough own , all you need is some scissors but the inofia is nice to give a cutting tool . the mattress is deflated at first until the mattress unrolled to inflate , you ll have no issue in the time since the unpacking took under an hour for me . maybe the size varies . give it about 24 - 72 hours if you really want to feel the difference . cooling does happen for the mattress even in the summer . on my old bed in the summer i would usually sweat like a roast in the oven , no covers . the the inofia mattress is different . i can sleep with no issue in the summer . now for the real gem for back pain and support . because i learned i need a soft / plush mattress , i went for memory foam . i work long hours at the job and sometimes ill be exhausted , double with me trying to be refreshed for work . even when the day of arrival came , my back was a bit sore from my old bed from probably sleeping weird . i gave memory foam a chance memory foam cradled me . i felt that nice tingle on my nerves and pressure points to keep me from tossing and turning so i can relax . i slept so good after a while that i almost forgot i went to sleep . i can feel the difference since i was always beyond tired on my old bed i needed more than 8hrs to sleep . the inofia took care of that and i feel refreshed ! not only i got a nicer price , a nicer price came with everything shown and what i was looking for . highly recommended !

72 hours if you really want to feel the difference . cooling does happen for the mattress even in the summer . on my old bed in the summer i would usually sweat like a roast in the oven , no covers . the the inofia mattress is different . i can sleep with no issue in the summer . now for the real gem for back pain and support . because i learned i need a soft / plush mattress , i went for memory foam . i work long hours at the job and sometimes ill be exhausted , double with me trying to be refreshed for work . even when the day of arrival came , my back was a bit sore from my old bed from probably sleeping weird . i gave memory foam a chance memory foam cradled me . i felt that nice tingle on my nerves and pressure points to keep me from tossing and turning so i can relax . i slept so good after a while that i almost forgot i went to sleep . i can feel the difference since i was always beyond tired on my old bed i needed more than 8hrs to sleep . the inofia took care of that and i feel refreshed ! not only i got a nicer price , a nicer price came with everything shown and what i was looking for . highly recommended !

Raw Review Text: i have only been sleeping on this mattress for about a week but i can already tell i am going to love this mattress ! this mattress is on the firmer side , but i can tell the memory foam topper is going to soften with time and use so i am not mad at the memory foam topper . the lack of energy transfer from one side to the other is non - existent which is amazing ! i am glad i finally committed to a new mattress , and even happier that this mattress is the one i chose . i would totally buy another one or try any other mattress from this company ! the prices are fair and the delivery was speedy , as usual ! i am very happy with this purchase .

Raw Review Text: i recently changed coasts on short notice . moving during a pandemic is . . . challenging . . . and when your movers never arrive , and you are forced to put everything you own into storage and cross the country in only the clothes on your back , well , you got ta start from scratch . the air mattress i borrowed from my friend was not exactly condusive to good sleep ( or to fooling around ) , but after the move i did not have the money for a full bed set . one of my new co - workers recommended this mattress , and i am glad one of my new co - workers did . this mattress a very high - quality mattress and this mattress arrived with lightning speed . it works like this . you put in the order , and within 72 hours in my case , the mattress arrives , tightly rolled and compressed into vacuum - sealed plastic . you roll the sucker to your intended bedroom , and when you cut the mattress loose of vacuum - sealed plastic the mattress expands almost the way a balloon expands , taking proper shape . that it . done and done . the pain - in - the - butt process of lugging a normal mattress , especially a larger one ( i ordered queen size ) into a house is largely avoided by virtue of the compression and roll shape . however , once freed from a normal mattress , especially a larger one ( i ordered queen size ) plastic prison , a normal mattress , especially a larger one ( i ordered queen size ) conforms to the normal dimensions of a mattress and fit neatly onto the box spring / frame which i eventually acquired . now , i should note here that this mattress wo not be for everyone , because everyone has different ideas on what makes a comfortable bed . this mattress is memory foam gel , which means this mattress has immediate give , but only to a certain point . this mattress is not a soft bed . this mattress is very firm . not hard , but firm , with a feeling of supporting your body rather than letting your body sink into this mattress . those who like soft beds will probably not find this style of mattress to those who like soft beds liking . this style of mattress might actually be a touch too firm for me and it took me a few weeks to adjust to this style of mattress , but i am happy with this style of mattress now . i rate products on the overall experience , and my overall experience with this mattress / company was good . the price was very reasonable , the shipping speed was blindingly fast , and as i said above , this style of mattress was much easier to handle physically than a conventional mattress , almost a hassle - free experience . this style of mattress comfortable , and while i do not know if provides pain relief ( as i was not in pain when i bought this style of mattress ) , i think this style of mattress a good product with good service .

Raw Review Text: i bought this bed frame in full size when i was ready to go for something much simpler but stylish . after reading reviews , i went for this bed frame and do not regret it ! it took us under an hour to set this bed frame up and it is not too difficult to do . a lot of screws are already in , you just have to follow the instructions . one person can do it , but it speedier to have two people . so far , i find this bed frame to be super sturdy and there has not been one squeak . this bed frame stays put and feels great . i am also able to store boxes under 13 inches under the bed , which is such a necessity for me . this bed frame is only for mattresses , not mattresses with box springs , so if you are complaining about a small headboard , it the buyer fault . also , my mattress is a sealy 10 inch and i clearly have a good view of the headboard . my mattress does not even reach the first row of buttons , so i d say this is ideally for mattresses under 10 - 11 inches . in the end , i am a very happy customer !

Raw Review Text: i did a lot of research before buying my new mattress . i wanted something that would give me actual support , but not be hard for sleeping on my stomach . i have had my new mattress now for about 5 months now , and i can say i want to buy 4 more just to stock up on for the future . i read some reviews about being able to feel the springs , but honestly my new mattress really causes no problems for me and the springs give my new mattress the bounce a mattress should have . my lower back pain is significantly less , and there is a clear difference if i sleep at a friends house for the night and then sleep at mine the next on my new mattress . the price point is impeccable , and my new mattress should definitely cost more for the quality you are getting . ( also beware when opening my new mattress , because once the packaging is cut off my new mattress flies open at warp speed )

Raw Review Text: i give enough stars for this bed ! everything about this bed is perfect , from the speed of shipping to the ease of assembly . the manufacturer simply thought of everything to make the experience as painless as possible . ill start with the product packaging - truly the best ever . putting all of the required parts in a zippered compartment in the headboard is genius . it saves on space for shipping , and it was so easy to find everything needed to get started . the instructions were simple and clear . things like the velcro for the slats and providing a ratchet allen wrench were lifesavers . it took maybe 15 - 20 minutes to assemble by myself . this bed is so sturdy and not a squeak from anywhere . i could be happier with this purchase . this bed beautiful and functional , and i highly recommend the manufacturer !

Raw Review Text: your browser does not support html5 video . i can not believe how they had this packed so tight and it ended up being so big . definitely a nice thick comfortable mattress . be very careful when you open the plastic on it . it flings open with a lot of force . we were very surprised . i videoed this with a faster speed , thinking it would take some time , boy was i wrong . lol . it was so fast . it did take a day for the foam part to fully fluff up . i bought this one as a replacement mattress for the one that was replaced . this one did make my bed a lot higher than my bed already was but i knew that when i placed the order for this one . i wanted a comfortable bed , unlike the one that was replaced . the foam topper on this makes this one so nice and comfortable . i thought the entire mattress was going to be foam , the entire mattress may have been listed but i must have over looked that . the foam topper on this is foam . it did nt matter thought because this one is so cozy . i am glad this one not all foam . this way this one has some give to this one and is nt stiff . i did not toss and turn in this one like i did the one that was replaced . the mattress when delivered was a little heavy and did take 2 people to carry the mattress and put the mattress on the bed to open the mattress . one person can do this on one person own , but a bit of a struggle , more so due to the length of it . did i mention how comfortable this one is . there s nothing like a new mattress . ahhh ! the pictures i added are right after opening the mattress , none are from a few days later , the mattress did fluff up more . forgot to take pictures again before leaving the one that was replaced .

Raw Review Text: so at first , when we got it , it did not expand right . after a week it was still misshapen and lumpy . inofia buyers , do not fret ! their you . s . customer service is amazing . within a day they responded to my email , i sent them pictures , and i got the new mattress a week later , free of charge . i was also told to keep the old mattress or do with the old mattress as i pleased - there was no need to return the old mattress to them . i can not believe the speed and sincerity from their customer service . even the deflated mattress is soft , wonderful memory foam and we are using even the deflated mattress in the kids playroom as padding . haha . i sat on the floor then compared even the deflated mattress to the old mattress , and let me tell you , there was no pain in my buttocks or knees on sitting ! it like a cloud and fantastic . so if you purchase one and it does not expand right , never fear ! their customer service is amazing ! we purchased the 6 inch mattress for my daughter loft bed , so i ca not even imagine how soft the thicker ones are ! ! i am glad i found this deal .

Raw Review Text: i moved into my second apartment and needed a bed , so i thought i would research the good ones on amazon . i immediately found the zinus to be the highest ranked bed and bedframe set , and a lot of the reviews spoke very highly of the shipping speed , packaging , installation , and overall comfort . the shipping speed , packaging , installation , and overall comfort are very true and i was over joyed when the bedframe arrived along with the mattress in a very concise 2 boxes . they are heavy so be sure to try to have someone to help you if you can , but i managed to get them up to the 2nd floor of my second apartment on my own . the quality of the mattress is very good and i feel that the additional bedframe slat supports do a great job supporting the mattress and my 200 lb body . i truly would not change anything other then possibly adding a few more inches of clearance from the ground , but overall i am very happy with my purchase and would absolutely buy from the zinus again .

Raw Review Text: best purchase i have made in ages ! slept on this type of mattress while on vacation last summer . opened this type of mattress within minutes of this type of mattress being delivered and walked away to let this type of mattress do it thing . peeked in on this type of mattress every couple of hours & this type of mattress was inflating appropriately . * important to note * every few hours i would pull up on the corners to help the fabric cover expand with the memory foam . i believe this really helped because i could see the corners would become tuck and not elevate at the same speed as the main body of this type of mattress . gave this type of mattress almost 3 days to expand before adding bedding and then sleeping on this type of mattress and have not looked back . no more sore hips & back . will buy the zinus cloud next time i need to replace another mattress .

Raw Review Text: i have had this memory foam mattress now for nearly 4 months and i am very pleased . the only reason i gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because this memory foam mattress is pretty warm - nothing i ca not live with , especially for the amazing price ( mine was about $ 181 ) . this memory foam mattress arrived as advertised - vacuum sealed in a box . thank goodness my building has an elevator - a a box is a very dense box . i followed the instructions carefully ( e . g . , did not cut the mattress liner , allowed 48 hours for this memory foam mattress to decompress , etc . ) and had no trouble whatsoever . i was a bit worried given some of the reviews , but i had none of the bad experiences i read about . there was no overpowering odor , this memory foam mattress gradually took shape ( including the corners ) , and i have been very happy since i started sleeping on this memory foam mattress . before buying this memory foam mattress , i was sleeping on a very old spring mattress and i experienced a great deal of lower back pain ( not caused by a very old spring mattress , but certainly not helped by a very old spring mattress ) . since sleeping on this memory foam mattress , i have noticed a marked decrease in my chronic back pain ( my chronic back pain still there , but i am in noticeably less pain on most mornings ) . the only complaint i have is that this memory foam mattress can feel warmer than a spring mattress because , after you sort of sink into this memory foam mattress , air does not really have a way to flow under your body . this has not been a huge problem for me - it not yet been hot outside so the extra warmth was manageable . i hope i can say the same after my first summer with this memory foam mattress . ill update this review if there a huge issue with the heat . for the amazing price , you seriously can not beat this memory foam mattress . i am very impressed ! !

Raw Review Text: i did not fully realize the negative effects of my old mattress on sleep quality until sleeping on this new mattress . my old mattress was about 20 years old , thin , and sagged . the springs were worn and poking through the cover in some spots . let just say that i probably had not had a truly good night sleep in years , and i was usually tired and cranky throughput the day . this new mattress arrived in seemed to be an impossibly small box , curled up and waiting . this new mattress hybrid combination of the gel foam and traditional springs expanded to full size after being set up on a non - sprung foundation , higher and prouder than my old mattress ever did , and invited me to lie upon this new mattress inviting surface . i declined to so right away , preferring to wait the 48 - hour expansion period as suggested by the setup guide . i woke up nearly in tears after the first nights sleep . i could not remember ever sleeping so well or feeling so rested . this new mattress is exactly as i prefer . . . this new mattress very firm but not stiff . the gel foam envelops while the springs support . this new mattress does not put my body in a you shape from sagging . if your old mattress is saggy and makes you grumpy every day , and you are looking for a firm yet comfortable mattress , i ca not recommend this new mattress enough . this new mattress made me a better , happier person .

Raw Review Text: i was afraid to purchase because of the bad reviews , but decided to give it a chance . i am so glad i did ! the mattress came in two days , tightly boxed and easy to handle . layed the mattress out on the box spring and took off the outer plastic . started hearing air whooshing immediately . gently removed the inner plastic and boom , the mattress was fully inflated . light weight enough to position , but firm enough to hold shape . no odor , no bugs ! the mattress is amazing . fits the frame perfectly - twin . very comfortable . soft topper . i will probably get two more in the near future . worth every dime !

Raw Review Text: i purchased this since it had predominately good reviews and sometimes people leave bad reviews because they expect too much of an inexpensive product . that being said i returned it because it was , in a word , awful . the mattress was rock hard . not exaggerating in the least . i laid on the mattress ( weighing about 140 ) and the mattress had absolutely zero give . i am actually shocked the mattress was able to fold the mattress was so stiff . the frame also had a permanent v shape to the frame and would not lay completely flat . could not force my guests to lay on something so uncomfortable , so the frame was returned and i will likely just buy a mattress and frame .

Raw Review Text: your browser does not support html5 video . i have given this 5 stars even though i have not really had it long enough to accurately rate a ) sleep quality , b ) pain relief , c ) comfort . but i did just open it today and after removing the packaging that was wrapped well ( the packaging that was wrapped well had a hole in the packaging that was wrapped well though but did not affect the foam mattress ) i already had plans to cut the foam with a bread - cutter because i am installing the foam mattress in a conversion van . let say the foam was easy to cut ! not sure if the knife was just so good but i am sure it was a combo of both the knife and the foam mattress that made cutting to specification easy ! i am giving it five stars because i am happy so far but will update the review respectively if the quality starts to diminish within 3 years . ( a conversion van is used once a month for camping so i will probably use the foam mattress a dozen or so times a year ) . also i probably did not read the contents well before buying but it comes with a waterproof protector . i had ordered one thinking i need one but since i did cut the foam , the zip - up protector this came with became too big and the protector i bought separately was perfect because the protector i bought separately was a fitted protector vs the zip - up protector this came with . ( disclaimer : i actually prefer the zip - up protector this came with if i had kept the mattress size the same since the bottom is also protected vs the protector i bought separately ) overall , excellent product out of the box . if it holds up well and i need another one for any other van or suv project i have . ill buy this again !

Raw Review Text: your browser does not support html5 video . god the memory foam mattress is amazing . the memory foam mattress is worth every penny i spent . yeah , the memory foam mattress heavy . the memory foam mattress arrived in a relatively small box made ! very good mattress for the money , came very quickly and set up was easy . after i removed the memory foam mattress from the plastic the memory foam mattress expanded and the rest is history . after sleeping on the memory foam mattress for over ten days now i can say this is the best sleep i had in my life . i have had the memory foam mattress for awhile now i can safety give the memory foam mattress a good rating . i was looking at a lot of other mattresses , but nothing was in my price range nor the inches i needed . i used to toss and turn all night long especially after i had hip surgery . the memory foam cradles you while the latex provides support keeping you from sinking to the bottom . my partner and i wanted a medium soft mattress because both my husband and i deal with back and hip pain . both my partner and i love the memory foam mattress . so much more comfortable than both my husband and i last , standard spring bed ! the memory foam mattress rises fairly quickly from the memory foam mattress packaging and is extremely comfortable . my hips do not bother me anymore ! i could have slept longer , except that my partner had lunch ready . i would be happy to sleep on the memory foam mattress every night . and for the price , you have nothing to lose ! super comfy ! so in ending if your thinking about purchasing the memory foam mattress i feel that it would not be a mistake . happy dreams .

Raw Review Text: " i have slept the 5 nights on this mattress so far . this mattress is a gorgeous mattress . the cover is so soft and plush . the embossing is beautiful . now to the important part - comfort . this mattress is a firm mattress . i think i may end up putting a topper on this mattress to give that sinking in feeling of memory foam . my mattress that came with the rv was horrible , i woke up in pain all night long . i did not wake up in pain any of the 5 nights . so that is a huge improvement . i did not sleep hot in my mattress that came with the rv . the quality is amazing . if i was to do it over , i d probably buy the narrow king rv which is 70x80 just to make making the bed easier . the narrow king rv which is 70x80 is a tight fit , even though the narrow king rv which is 70x80 is what i removed . there was minimal smell , unlike other mattresses i have bought . it is as nice as my home bed that is 14 " " foam mattress ( which i have a topper on as well ) . it came promptly . make sure you open it on the platform . "

Raw Review Text: " my wife and i have been sleeping on an old 12 " " mattress with a 3 " " topper . for many years my wife and i have both had intermittent lower back problems that my wife and i see a chiropractor for . recently the back pain has been bad in the morning , to the point my wife could barely walk . the back pain kept my wife constantly waking up all night long , 10 - 15 times a night . my wife and i decided to try a new mattress and see if a new mattress helps . shipping was very fast . my wife is mostly side sleeper , i am mostly back , so they recommended med - firm ( queen ) . customer service was great . yes , a new mattress is heavy , 140 lbs . there is a noticeable barnyard smell from the natural wool topper that mostly dissipated letting the natural wool topper air out for a while . truth be told , i kind of liked a new mattress . first impression was a new mattress looked like a kids bed compared to my wife and i old 15 " " thick stack ! that quickly turned into a plus when my wife and i made the bed ! no lifting a new mattress , the corners of latex simply bend up to tuck the sheets ! and the sheets . . . actually fit ! and you can comfortably sit on the bed to put shoes on ! now for sleeping . the first night , my wife and i backs both felt a little better . the next couple of nights , not so much . not as bad as before , but a definite step back ( still morning pain ) . then , over the next few days it got much better , and now is completely gone in the morning ! on your back , you sink in just enough to feel it lightly touching the small of your back supporting it . and my wife sleeps soundly all night long . saved 2 trips to a chiropractor . the biggest problem now is getting my wife out of it ! highly recommended ! "

clean_Raw Review Text: " my wife and i have been sleeping on an old 12 " " mattress with a 3 " " topper . for many years my wife and i have both had intermittent lower back problems that my wife and i see a chiropractor for . recently the back pain has been bad in the morning , to the point my wife could barely walk . the back pain kept my wife constantly waking up all night long , 10 - 15 times a night . my wife and i decided to try a new mattress and see if a new mattress helps . shipping was very fast . my wife is mostly side sleeper , i am mostly back , so they recommended med - firm ( queen ) . customer service was great . yes , a new mattress is heavy , 140 lbs . there is a noticeable barnyard smell from the natural wool topper that mostly dissipated letting the natural wool topper air out for a while . truth be told , i kind of liked a new mattress . first impression was a new mattress looked like a kids bed compared to my wife and i old 15 " " thick stack ! that quickly turned into a plus when my wife and i made the bed ! no lifting a new mattress , the corners of latex simply bend up to tuck the sheets ! and the sheets . . . actually fit ! and you can comfortably sit on the bed to put shoes on ! now for sleeping . the first night , my wife and i backs both felt a little better . the next couple of nights , not so much . not as bad as before , but a definite step back ( still morning pain ) . then , over the next few days it got much better , and now is completely gone in the morning ! on your back , you sink in just enough to feel it lightly touching the small of your back supporting it . and my wife sleeps soundly all night long . saved 2 trips to a chiropractor . the biggest problem now is getting my wife out of it ! highly recommended ! "

Raw Review Text: i know this will be an unusual review because this mattress is for my dogs . i have two large senior dogs . this mattress ( with waterproof cover , old mattress pad , sheet and blanket ) is on the floor of our bedroom for their comfort . it replaced two large dog beds whose foam gave up way too quickly . the dogs curl up with us on the tv room sofa in the evening . they started to be reluctant to get up to go to bed . looked for new dog beds , nothing looked like it would be big enough and supportive enough . with this mattress , they both get right up and happily head to bed . it perfect for them , we have enough room for it , and it was cheaper than most dog beds intended for senior dogs .

Raw Review Text: " i ordered this mattress for my 11 year old son new loft bed . a 6 " " mattress was recommended to leave enough rail for safety . his old mattress required a foam topper to be comfortable , which brought it above the rails . i was a little worried that a 6 " " mattress would not provide enough support , so we saved the topper " " just in case . " " we unboxed the mattress in the evening , thinking it would need to sit overnight before we could use it . within a few minutes , it had expanded to full size , so we went ahead and made the swap . my son instantly raved about how comfortable it is , and said he does not even need the foam topper anymore . my daughter , who also has a foam mattress that is much thicker , spent the evening reading in his bed . she said it is much more comfortable than hers , so we may be buying another ! "
