Raw Review Text: " update : i originally gave this bed 5 stars , i am updating it to a 2 . i have used this mattress for less than a month and while it was originally comfortable and retained it shape , that is no longer the case . the mattress now had deep valleys and lumps where i sleep , and it not just when i get out of bed in the morning , they are still there when i get back into bed in the evening , and it is very uncomfortable to sleep in . i have tried rotating the mattress so we are not sleeping in the same spots but that has not helped . i am not overweight and maintain a normal bmi , not that it would be an excuse for the mattress not to retain it shape , but thought it was important to add . i would think twice if you are purchasing this mattress for regular use . i think it " " may " " be fine for a guest bedroom for the price but not as an everyday sleeper . original : i purchased this mattress to replace a 12 inch hybrid from another company . i went with the 14 inch because the other mattress i had was uncomfortable and gave me pressure sores . the 14inch mattress was not overly soft ( just right ! ) and did not sink when my partner got into bed . it is very comfortable and i am happy to finally have a pain free night of sleep . the box was very damaged when it arrived ( ups issue ) but the bed was wrapped in a very heavy gauge plastic and was in mint condition . unboxing was easy it expanded to it full height in less than 12 hours , though i did leave it be for the full 48 hours that was suggested . there was no odor . overall i am very impressed for the price . my only complaint is the handles on the side are very flimsy and already seem to be separating after using them to lift the mattress to put on bedding . "

Raw Review Text: after 48 hours , my 10 in . gel memory foam linus full size mattress inflated to 9 in . x 51 in . x 72 in . a regular full size should be 54 in . x 75 in . i registered my mattress on the official website for the warranty . the live chat customer rep shared these tips for full inflation : full expansion times may vary depending on how long the mattress has been in packaging . it may take just a few days or a few weeks . there are a few things that may help open up the foam pores and speed up the expansion process . 1 . foam reacts best to warmer temperatures . because of this , we recommend setting the mattress next to a window with sunlight or next to a heater . 2 . second , is to walk along the mattress with clean feet as this will unpinch certain areas . 3 . third , if the bottom portion has fully expanded , we recommend using the mattress since body heat is another source for the memory foam to expand . if , after two weeks of opening and trying these things , you are still having a problem with expansion , let us know . well do our best to help you .

Raw Review Text: i am impressed . this is my first foam bed and i did not have any way to test them out beforehand . i was able to unpack it and set it up by myself easily . it poofed up fast and is very comfortable . i am a side sleeper so my only issue is that you sink in a bit and its a little hard to roll over quickly and easily . however , i toss and turn a lot less now , so the tradeoff is worth it . if you are a heavy person and a side sleeper , you might want to try for a bit firmer of a mattress , but for me it works great . best $ 100 i have spent in a loooong time . if it lasts 2 years it will be well worth it .

Raw Review Text: so we purchased a bib years ago and loved it , never had a problem , but after years it finally started to go out so we had to buy another . we were hesitant because we heard quality had lapsed , but really did our due diligence and read reviews . . . took about 2 months before we finally made a decision . we went with the zinus because it best fit our needs with the best ratings and areviews . . . . i am a big guy about 230 and 511 started experiencing lower back issues earlier this year . . . it was because of the old memory foam mattress we had being so old . doc told me needed to get a more firm bed and one that would support side sleeper because i sleep on side , so one that is pressure sensitive . got it home , unboxed it , let it sit for about 4 days and after 2 we already had our concerns . saw at one end of the bed that it did not seem to be rising as much as the other . . . even measured the sides , we had 9 on one side , 8 on one side 10 on one side and 8 . 5 on the other corner and different numbers in the middle . . . . it just did not want to rise . we finally said let us give it a go , tried it , first 3 nights i slept well , not as much back issues ( a little but not much as previous mattress ) . then on 4th day , i had to get up and move to the couch . next morning we took bedding off and realized the bed had welts , uneven cave ins in different places , just oddities everywhere . . . no even places , so apparently this memory foam had lost its memory real fast . had to get a refund and return , not buying this again . some get the good ones , we just got the bad , it was our time . we will be buying another bib .

Raw Review Text: we have a very tiny guest room and do not have many overnight guests so i wanted an affordable mattress that was not going to break the bank . i saw this one on amazon and read the reviews so i gave it a shot . it arrived fast and was very easy to unbox and set up . we ordered a full size mattress and are using it on a full size platform bed and although it a little big for the frame it fits quite well . these photos were taken right after the unboxing but it already a decent depth and puffing up nicely . i probably wo not sleep on it myself , but i did roll around on it a bit and it very comfortable . i think that as a guest bed mattress with infrequent use , it going to be just perfect . ca not beat the price either !

Raw Review Text: i decided to wait a month from buying the mattress to review and i am glad i did . it was comfortable when we first laid on it , but after one night , we began sinking into the middle . it not firm and i have never had worse back pain in my life . we will not be keeping this mattress . i think it would be fine in an infrequently used guest room or for a child , but for an average weight couple it is no good . this was a $ 200 lesson for us to never buy an inexpensive mattress !

Raw Review Text: ( note i am roughly 120lb . mattress feels may be different for people in different weight ranges . i sleep in all poses - back , side , belly ) i have own this mattress for 2 . 5 years now , so i can attest to its qualities after it has broken in . this is a firm mattress , but not hard . i picked a pocket springs mattress because it isolates movement . i always use it with a mattress pad . i do not feel the springs when i lay on my back or sides . i only feel it if i use my palm to press against the surface . there is occasionally a squeak from the springs , but they are infrequent enough and do not because any issue . i would buy this budget mattress again .

Raw Review Text: i bought two mattresses for stackable twin bedframes . these are for my least - used guest room so i honestly was not too worried about ultimate comfort , but i slept on them to make sure i was not going to put the infrequent guest through torture . i found them to be comfortable . they arrived safely and promptly , and expanded to their full size almost immediately , though i waited the suggested timeframe before using them . there was no harsh odor after opening as far as i could tell . more comfortable than the mattresses i was trying at brick - and - mortar stores , and they were a bit cheaper to boot , so i guess you ca not really go wrong .

Raw Review Text: first off i have to say that they really need to use better cardboard . the box they used is so thin it was literally shredded when it got to our house . the ups man actually left me an apology note for the shape the box was in . luckily the plastic was not damaged at all so the mattress was okay . the mattress had 2 layers of plastic - one around the entire mattress and an outer layer after it was rolled up to keep it from unrolling . once i removed the outer plastic , the whole mattress inflated in about a minute . there was never any odor . we let it sit on the living room floor for 2 days before putting it on our bed . the first thing i noticed about this mattress is it very springy . there some bounce when i roll from side to back to side . it on the softish side . it feels like there support , but it not too firm . as far as the edge of the bed , yea , just stay off it . as you can see from the pic the springs do not go to the edge so it squishes right down if you try to sit on it . only time will tell how long this mattress lasts . i will make sure to update .

Raw Review Text: this mattress made me sick ! after letting the mattress off - gas outside for 4 days , i slept on it for 2 nights . i woke up coughing from the smell and had to sleep on the floor in a different room . i put it back outside for another 3 days then brought it back inside . it stinks like old socks and cabbage and has made the bedroom smell just as bad . update : after the seller viewed my rating , i was contacted about getting either a new mattress or a full refund . they apologized for the inconvenience and issued me a full refund 4 business days after the review . great customer service which i totally appreciate . i will remember their company for the future . i would consider buying a mattress from them online one more time , though not the same model , just because their customer service was so good . now 3 / 5 stars , up from 1 / 5 .

Raw Review Text: i never liked the idea of purchasing beds online , because i have heard some unboxing and user horror stories . but since this is so far the notorious midway of 2020 , i had no choice due to all stores being closed . so , i purchased this bed for my mom who a senior citizen , in hopes of helping to ease her daily back pain . the price was a surprisingly low , since i instantly figured it must be cheap , or thin crust pizza type of disappointing . . lol well , i apologized to the mattress when it got here . because it was actually affordable , arrived earlier than expected , and was super easy to set up and use . i am happy to report that so far , my mom has been sleeping well through the night undisturbed , and wakes with a more ease and movement in her joints . she gives it a thumbs up and says its firm enough to support her bodyweight , without feeling as if she lying on a wooden board . : ) i am grateful for the trial period the company offers ; as this is helpful should anything change and a refund is needed . at a time like this when we are all unable to access certain stores , id say the price , fast delivery , and very happy customer made this first time online purchase of a bed , well worth it .

Raw Review Text: " i purchased this mattress mostly because it states its foam is " " oeko - tex " " certified , which is expected to lower voc emission and improve indoor air quality . honestly , this memory foam mattress is more expensive than other common brands memory foam mattress , and the reason i am willing to spend the money is because the oeko - tex certificate . after two night sleep , there is still some smell , which is normal for foams . however , when i contact the seller for their oeko certificate , they simply told me it is not " " readily available " " . i followed up twice with them , and they just ignored my message . i think it is important to be honest with consumers , if you are not oeko certified , then do not say so , this is misleading and cheating . my next step will be contact amazon for further information ; if not able to resolve , i plan to contact bbb or attorney general for further investigation for this cheating behavior . "

Raw Review Text: " please note that these are not a " " gel foam " " mattress as listed in the title . i have two gel foam mattresses and these feel nothing like a gel foam mattress . these mattresses feel much more like a thick piece of soft foam . they are not very firm either so they would be best for a small and light person ( ie child ) . . . an adult of average weight ( 140 - 180lbs ) sinks into them pretty good . i have chosen to keep the mattress because they are for two toddlers and the perfect size for their beds . customer service was just ok . i ordered two same size mattresses . when they arrived i got one correct size and one wrong size . i requested a return due to the error and did not get any sort of " " sorry for the error " " message until i followed up asking about when i could expect my refund and if they would expedite shipping due to their error . they were polite but did not offer any make good ( expedited shipping ) for the error . again , nothing wrong with customer service i just would not say it outstanding . "

Raw Review Text: " i was really excited to get this mattress . i ordered the split king flex with adjustable base direct from ghostbed and was excited to see on their website that they shipped out quickly . sadly , they did not ship quickly . they took a couple weeks then shipped out my mattresses without the adjustable bases . it took another 3 weeks for my bases to arrive ! when i finally got it all together , i was super excited . sadly , i found the mattresses to be very hard . now i know there is a break in period so we slept on them almost 60 nights . they did soften up some but were still not very comfortable . at this point , one of the adjustable bases was making some terrible noises and they had to ship out a replacement . all along this time , any email or call out to customer service was painful and you have to wait close to a week between responses . i assume they only have 1 or 2 agents fielding requests and it really the worst . knowing my trial period was coming up and these uncomfortable mattresses were not cheap , i reached out to do a return . they got back to me and said i still had some time and were persistent on sending me some free toppers to make it more comfortable . i did not really want it but begrudgingly agreed . the toppers took about a week and a half to arrive and they were these giant 3 " " memory foam toppers . the bed already sat up super high and this made it worse . they were very generic toppers and really made the bed very warm ( it did sleep nice and cool without the topper ) so after a couple nights i requested a return again . same thing , super super slow responses . i guess normally they would help you donate the items but blaming covid , i had to figure it out on my own . i donated and sent the receipt to them and waited another week and a half or so before they said it was accepted and they would process the refund within 15 business days ! that 3 weeks ! ! ! after hitting the 3 week mark , i emailed again . within an hour i saw my refund get processed . i am sad the bases were not refundable because now i got stuck overpaying for generic bases . i was also out a fair amount of money having to buy a new mattress before getting my refund . overall , i find ghostbed to be a poorly run company with a great marketing department selling mediocre products at a premium price . their customer service is a complete disaster and they really should outsource because it could not be worse ! i now feel burned and went to a traditional mattress store where i could lay on a bunch of beds and try out what worked best for me . i will never but a " " bed in a box " " again and would encourage others to run away ! "

Raw Review Text: i took a risk on this mattress after reading the reviews . either it was going to be great or terrible . unfortunately , this far the experience has been terrible . after unboxing and allowing the mattress to decompress for three days , it was extremely uneven all around . i contact the seller who got back to me quickly , and said they would exchange or refund , but i would have to send the defective mattress back . unless you can completely compress the mattress back to it shipped state , it ca not be sent back . fedex came to pick up the mattress after i packaged it in its expanded state . they refused pick up and said it too large for them . i am currently in limbo , trying to get rid of this mattress and get my money back . only purchase this mattress if you are feeling lucky you are going to get a good one !

Raw Review Text: i did a lot of research before i bought my first memory foam bed . after all was said and done i ordered this mattress and a 3 inch topper from another company . i slept on just the mattress for a few night while i waited for the topper to come . i truly could not believe how well i slept and how comfortable this mattress is . i love it ! the topper came and after the first night we slept with the topper i wanted to take it off the mattress . i liked just he mattress better . i did give it a few days and it all good now just a little soft . this mattress is firm but not too firm . i have a herniated disk , a pinched nerve in my spine and degenerate disk disease and was worried about being in pain . no pain at all when i sleep . i was going to purchase the purple mattress first but i went to the store to try out their cushions first . kind of see how well it felt . it was not good at all so i bought a different cushion ( memory foam with cooling ) and it great . i figured if the purple company could not figure out a cushion i was not going to invent a couple thousand on their mattress and all that goes with . i highly recommend this mattress . it does not bring the heat and i have zero smell with this mattress . got here ahead of schedule but the darn thing is heavy so let a couple guys carrier to where it needs to go .

Raw Review Text: a friend recommended this mattress to us and we decided to give it a go . it arrived a day ahead of schedule in a well packaged box . followed the directions and let it breathe for a couple of days once we got it out of the plastic . it took no time at all to expand to full size and we hoped we would not need to stuff it back in the box for returning because it probably would never shrink back down . we have used the mattress now for a couple of months and continually are amazed at the firm but comfortable support it provides . i was skeptical that it would have the firmness we were looking for since it all foam but i sleep better and longer than i have in a year or more . well done tuft & needle !

Raw Review Text: this was our second one we bought . the first one was fine . we used it for 3 years then decided to replace it with a new one . the one we received did not fully expand and never fully got to the size it should be . we called the company and they said since we bought it through amazon they would not do any warranty work , we had to go through amazon to get our money back or a replacement . amazon said they would only refund our money back once , if we decide to just get a replacement and that one does not fully expand then we are stuck with it . so i chose to get a refund . the only downfall is they did not want the mattress back so i was stuck with getting rid of it . hope this helps ! ! !
